quotes: Executive Secretary, United Nations Framework Convention of Climate Change (2016-2022)
Patricia Espinosa served as Executive Secretary of the United Nations Framework Convention of Climate Change (UNFCCC) from 2016-2022.
Ambassador of Mexico to Germany (2012-2016)
